MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL14 Afoneitha area of Penycae affecting properties in Ffordd Llanerch and surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:16pm on the 30th October 2020.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the LL14 Afoneitha area of Penycae affecting properties in Ffordd Llanerch and surrounding area.
